description: This hike is an ascent towards Kokanee Glacier, from the lodge in Kokanee Glacier Park which is a very nice lodge great facilities, electric , showers , cooking stations . Bunk bed sleeping. Very reasonable fee per night. This hike take you up to a keyhole that is very extreme and dangerous. We did not go any further  rope and gear  needed.
directions: From Nelson BC drive north on Hwy 3A till you get to KOKANEE CREEK PARK on Kootenay Lake turn at Lat 49.611417° Long -117.116159° up Kokanee Glacier Road drive to parking area at Lat 49.722994° , Long -117.152848° Gibson Lake. It is then a 3 hr. hike to the lodge and is spectacular by its self. Good trail standard park trail
title: Kokanee Glacier Keyhole
